about_the_game:
Wishing Sarah is the tiny direct sequel to Dreaming Sarah.

After being in a coma, Sarah finally wakes up to find something odd about the world the lives in. She can't seem to understand what's going on very well, and you must help her traverse this new world - filled with intriguing new characters and events.

This small, free DLC will bridge the gap between Dreaming Sarah and the next game that's yet to come, Awakening Sarah.

  • This DLC includes the original Gameboy ROM file.

name: Wishing Sarah

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 210 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any
